job.title: Senior Product Manager - Remote - Drive Decisions!
job.description: If you are a Senior Product Manager with 4 years of experience please read onbrbrstrong Job Titlestrong Senior Product Managerbrbrstrong Locationstrong Remote HQs in CSTbrbrstrong Salarystrong 120130Kbrbrstrong Requirementsstrong BS Degree with 4  years of experience working with SaaS applicationsbrbrThis would be an amazing opportunity for you if you are looking for a dynamic team fast paced environment with a seat at the table to explore your passion for productbrbrstrongAdditional ways in which a candidate may stand out would bebrstrongulli Internal and External Client Whisperlili Active Listener and Storytellerlili Currently has input to the roadmap prioritizationlili Feels comfortable working in a small team environmentlili Healthcare industry experiencebrliulWhats In It for Youbrulli VacationPTO Unlimitedlili Medicallili Dentallili Visionlili 401kbrliulWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli Translates product strategy into detailed business and user requirements and prototypes and works with engineers to implement these featureslili Builds deep customer understanding to represent the customers voice and solve for their needs throughout the product development processeslili Takes ownership for the daytoday decisions on analytics features within the productslili Conducts product research to further understand the competitive landscape opportunities for growth and best in class product requirementslili Partners with internal and external domain experts to highlight current and emerging analytic product trendslili Assists with go to market strategy of all analytics capabilities while meeting market demand and timetablelili Evangelizes the product within the marketlili Supports customer acquisition adoption and ongoing support activitiesbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli BA or BS is required degree in a quantitative field of study preferredlili 5 years of experience working on SaaS applications and technologieslili Agile development process experiencelili Has proven success in launching new features and building product adoption and engagementlili Familiarity with both web and native mobile applicationslili Knows how to build empathy with customerslili Ability to speak fluently with everyone developers marketers sales customer success clients prospects and stakeholderslili Strong written and presentation skillslili Very strong analytical skills high degree of comfort with statistical concepts understanding how to use data to drive decisions and workflowslili SQL skills a plusbrliulSo if you are a Senior Product Manager with 4 years of experience please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrJennParrellaCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin
